channel.title: [Dementhium 639] Dialogue Related - Turning all items in

item.title: [Dementhium 639] Dialogue Related - Turning all items in
item.dc:creator: @JavaProgrammer JavaProgrammer
item.description:
@JavaProgrammer wrote:

I have made a pk guy but I want to shorten this by alot and I want it to take all of the pk items and give them the exact ammount of tokens and coins they should get.

[code=java] case 10000:
sendOptionDialogue(player, new int[]{10001, -1}, “I want to turn in my pvp items”, “Nothing.”);
return true;
case 10001:
sendDialogue(player, HAPPY_TALKING, -1, 10002, “I want to turn in my pvp items”);
return true;
case 10002:
if (player.getInventory().contains(14876, 1)) {
player.getInventory().deleteItem(14876, 1);
player.getInventory().addItem(12852, 55);
player.getInventory().addItem(995, 5000000);
sendDialogue(player, HAPPY_TALKING, 6539, -1, “Thank you.”);

	} else if (player.getInventory().contains(14877, 1)) {
			player.getInventory().deleteItem(14877, 1);
			player.getInventory().addItem(12852, 75);
			player.getInventory().addItem(995, 1000000);
	sendDialogue(player, HAPPY_TALKING, 6539, -1, "Thank you.");

	} else if (player.getInventory().contains(14878, 1)) {
			player.getInventory().deleteItem(14878, 1);
			player.getInventory().addItem(12852, 70);
			player.getInventory().addItem(995, 750000);
	sendDialogue(player, HAPPY_TALKING, 6539, -1, "Thank you.");

	} else if (player.getInventory().contains(14879, 1)) {
			player.getInventory().deleteItem(14879, 1);
			player.getInventory().addItem(12852, 65);
			player.getInventory().addItem(995, 500000);
	sendDialogue(player, HAPPY_TALKING, 6539, -1, "Thank you.");

	} else if (player.getInventory().contains(14880, 1)) {
			player.getInventory().deleteItem(14880, 1);
			player.getInventory().addItem(12852, 60);
			player.getInventory().addItem(995, 400000);
	sendDialogue(player, HAPPY_TALKING, 6539, -1, "Thank you.");

	} else if (player.getInventory().contains(14881, 1)) {
			player.getInventory().deleteItem(14881, 1);
			player.getInventory().addItem(12852, 55);
			player.getInventory().addItem(995, 300000);
	sendDialogue(player, HAPPY_TALKING, 6539, -1, "Thank you.");

	} else if (player.getInventory().contains(14882, 1)) {
			player.getInventory().deleteItem(14882, 1);
			player.getInventory().addItem(12852, 50);
			player.getInventory().addItem(995, 250000);
	sendDialogue(player, HAPPY_TALKING, 6539, -1, "Thank you.");

	} else if (player.getInventory().contains(14883, 1)) {
			player.getInventory().deleteItem(14883, 1);
			player.getInventory().addItem(12852, 45);
			player.getInventory().addItem(995, 200000);
	sendDialogue(player, HAPPY_TALKING, 6539, -1, "Thank you.");

	} else if (player.getInventory().contains(14884, 1)) {
			player.getInventory().deleteItem(14884, 1);
			player.getInventory().addItem(12852, 40);
			player.getInventory().addItem(995, 150000);
	sendDialogue(player, HAPPY_TALKING, 6539, -1, "Thank you.");

	} else if (player.getInventory().contains(14885, 1)) {
			player.getInventory().deleteItem(14885, 1);
			player.getInventory().addItem(12852, 35);
			player.getInventory().addItem(995, 100000);
	sendDialogue(player, HAPPY_TALKING, 6539, -1, "Thank you.");

	} else if (player.getInventory().contains(14886, 1)) {
			player.getInventory().deleteItem(14886, 1);
			player.getInventory().addItem(12852, 30);
			player.getInventory().addItem(995, 75000);
	sendDialogue(player, HAPPY_TALKING, 6539, -1, "Thank you.");

	} else if (player.getInventory().contains(14887, 1)) {
			player.getInventory().deleteItem(14887, 1);
			player.getInventory().addItem(12852, 25);
			player.getInventory().addItem(995, 50000);
	sendDialogue(player, HAPPY_TALKING, 6539, -1, "Thank you.");

	} else if (player.getInventory().contains(14888, 1)) {
			player.getInventory().deleteItem(14888, 1);
			player.getInventory().addItem(12852, 20);
			player.getInventory().addItem(995, 40000);
	sendDialogue(player, HAPPY_TALKING, 6539, -1, "Thank you.");

	} else if (player.getInventory().contains(14889, 1)) {
			player.getInventory().deleteItem(14889, 1);
			player.getInventory().addItem(12852, 15);
			player.getInventory().addItem(995, 30000);
	sendDialogue(player, HAPPY_TALKING, 6539, -1, "Thank you.");

	} else if (player.getInventory().contains(14890, 1)) {
			player.getInventory().deleteItem(14890, 1);
			player.getInventory().addItem(12852, 10);
			player.getInventory().addItem(995, 20000);
	sendDialogue(player, HAPPY_TALKING, 6539, -1, "Thank you.");

	} else if (player.getInventory().contains(14891, 1)) {
			player.getInventory().deleteItem(14891, 1);
			player.getInventory().addItem(12852, 5);
			player.getInventory().addItem(995, 10000);
	sendDialogue(player, HAPPY_TALKING, 6539, -1, "Thank you.");

	} else if (player.getInventory().contains(14892, 1)) {
			player.getInventory().deleteItem(14892, 1);
			player.getInventory().addItem(12852, 1);
			player.getInventory().addItem(995, 5000);
	sendDialogue(player, HAPPY_TALKING, 6539, -1, "Thank you.");
	} else { 
		sendDialogue(player, TOUGH, 6539, -1, "You don't have any pk items.");
		return true;
	}[/code]

This is the ancient statuette.
Lets say I have 16 ancient statuettes and I want them all to be turned in with the amount of cash and tokens of 16 ancient statuettes
How would I do that?

case 10002: if (player.getInventory().contains(14876, 1)) { player.getInventory().deleteItem(14876, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(12852, 55); player.getInventory().addItem(995, 5000000); sendDialogue(player, HAPPY_TALKING, 6539, -1, "Thank you.");
